title: bug: Error: Genesis is not needed as L1 verifier key does not match the one in the config
body:
### ðŸ› Bug Report

#### ðŸ“ Description

Meet error when genesis chain. error logs as below:

* try to fix but failed.
I've been tried to bugfix by follow below
 https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync-era/blob/d562a4ec15aab3b8bcde8cee81c32aea47274c16/docs/guides/launch.md#L160-L255

It dones work. Seems like not the same reason caused the bug.


#### ðŸ”„ Reproduction Steps

```bash
zk stack init
```

or 
```bash
zk init
```

#### ðŸ¤” Expected Behavior

successfully init.


#### ðŸ–¥ï¸ Environment

* ubuntu
* comimt: 8f55cae360709e1ac99ffc4398174938ca61ec54

#### ðŸ“‹ Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here. If applicable, add screenshots to help explain.
